abstract: Meadow Rain Walker, daughter of actor Paul Walker, sues Porsche Cars North America; claims numerous missing safety features on Carrera GT were responsible for her father's death, trapping him inside car after crash that occurred while Walker was on break in filming of movie Furious 7.
lead_paragraph: Paul Walker’s daughter sued Porsche for wrongful death, claiming the car he was in when he was killed had numerous design defects.

headline.main: Lawsuit Filed Against Porsche in ‘Fast & Furious’ Actor’s Death
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Filed Against Porsche in ‘fast & Furious’ Actor’s Death

snippet: Paul Walker’s daughter sued Porsche for wrongful death, claiming the car he was in when he was killed had numerous design defects.
